channel.title: [PI] MTP- PKing server - Turmoil/X10
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Comment what can be done to make this better or if you have questions[/size] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/33nzr7n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/302whag.png[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/n1qm9y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/122j1g9.png[/img]
Features: Edge based (pking in wildy) Dark mage will teleport you places in wildy too! Great shops - too many to take pictures Working staff of light & spirit sheilds effects Perfect Combat Very stable- Server never crashes Working Specials for Vesta, Statius, And all Gs and claws Non cb skilling as you can see from a shop picture Turmoil Only 2 starters per ip. You cannot create many accounts and xfer stuff. Anti pk point farming
Base is Project insanity/New Era I added quite alot including a whole new combat system, non combat skilling, turmoil, working specials for all weapons, and alot more
Downloads:
www.mtpserver.tk - server with .java files www.mtpclientjava1.tk - client with .java files

item.title: [PI] MTP- PKing server - Turmoil/X10
item.dc:creator: @ajisamazing ajisamazing
item.description:
@ajisamazing wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:55, topic:354166”][quote author=ajisamazing link=topic=450456.msg3331034#msg3331034 date=1283473609]
Hey, D Claws have unlimited spec on this server. How can I fix this?
Thanks.
[/quote]

I never released the version with claws all pvp armor and alot more additions but you can see a tutorial for claws with 4 hits/2 specs on rune-serba altho 2 specs is very easy to do. What i did for 2 specs was in itemhandler i took ags code for specs and added it with claws and that got me 2[/quote]
No man, I could careless if claws had 4 hits or 2 hits. The thing is, everyone who has D claws has unlimited spec with them and they can keep specing forever. I want to know where and how I would fix this.

Read full topic
